name: Physics Lab Report Rubric
description: Comprehensive rubric for grading physics laboratory reports

excellent.description: Clear, concise title. Abstract summarizes purpose, methods, results, and conclusions in 150-250 words

good.description: Appropriate title. Abstract covers most key elements but may lack detail

satisfactory.description: Basic title. Abstract present but missing important elements

needs_improvement.description: Vague title or missing abstract, incomplete information

excellent.description: Clear statement of objectives. Thorough explanation of relevant physics principles, equations, and theory with proper citations

good.description: Objectives stated. Good coverage of theory with minor gaps

satisfactory.description: Objectives present. Basic theory explanation, may lack depth

needs_improvement.description: Unclear objectives. Insufficient or incorrect theory

excellent.description: Detailed description with diagrams. Clear, reproducible steps. Equipment specifications included

good.description: Good description. Steps mostly clear, minor details missing

satisfactory.description: Basic description. Procedure understandable but lacks detail

needs_improvement.description: Vague or incomplete description. Not reproducible

excellent.description: Well-organized tables/graphs with units, uncertainties, and multiple trials. Raw data and observations clearly documented

good.description: Data organized with tables/graphs. Most units and uncertainties present

satisfactory.description: Data present but organization or completeness lacking

needs_improvement.description: Missing data, no tables/graphs, or units/uncertainties omitted

excellent.description: Complete calculations with clear steps. Proper error propagation and uncertainty analysis. Results with significant figures

good.description: Calculations mostly complete. Some error analysis present

satisfactory.description: Basic calculations shown. Limited error analysis

needs_improvement.description: Calculations missing steps or incorrect. No error analysis

excellent.description: Clear comparison with theory/expected values. Thorough discussion of sources of error and their impact

good.description: Results compared with theory. Discussion of main error sources

satisfactory.description: Results stated. Brief discussion of errors

needs_improvement.description: Results unclear or missing comparison. Limited error discussion

excellent.description: Clear summary of findings. Relates results to objectives. Suggests improvements

good.description: Summarizes main findings. Relates to objectives
